name: Christmas Maniac
description:
For 15 years Jason Berkowitz has stared at an empty wall in the Houston Warris County Mental Hospital.But tonight he escape start his BLOOD SOAKED murder rampage at his family members and has strong hallucinations of people from his past.

It's best played in the dark and with headphones on.

 It should take you around  10- 20 minutes to complete. You can change the settings in the menu

Note: The Game is still in Development(PRE ALPHA)

is a Cancelled game i made i just upload the last build i had,if you find it nice let me know:)

Controls

WASD to move, 

Escape to pause menu

  Mouse to look, 

Left mouse click to kill

 E to use interact,

Shift to Run
